content:
I think I found the web page to check for future training for email and other one on one messaging contact (not text).  I was just wondering how soon digital corr will open for new folks. I am bilingual in Spanish if that helps get me on the list.  Gracias!

I chose tech support tag because there is not a way to contact corr team on Discord until you have been trained for corr. 

Thanks. ðŸ™‚

https://democrats.org/digital-correspondence/
So I'm pretty sure after the convention there should be more oppertunties.
That's what the leader said who runs digital correspondence.
Thanks, btw, I signed up for national text training on Sat too. ðŸ™‚
Decided to do call training on Mon since I am bilingual. Just commenting here again to keep this on the radar. I still don't see anything yet, but I have plenty to do. ðŸ™‚
